players.name: Lionel Mpasi
players.summary: Lionnel Mpasi Nzau is a professional footballer who plays as goalkeeper for Ligue 1 club Le Havre. Born in France, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Timothy Fayulu
players.summary: Timothy Bruce Fayulu is a professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Armenian Premier League club FC Noah on loan from Sion. Born in Switzerland, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Matthieu Epolo
players.summary: Matthieu Epolo Luka is a professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Belgian Pro League club Standard Liège. Born in Belgium, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Dimitry Bertaud
players.summary: Dimitry Jean Sylvain Bertaud Yaka is a professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper. Born in France, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Aaron Wan-Bissaka
players.summary: Aaron Wan-Bissaka is a professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Premier League club West Ham United. Born in England, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Steve Kapuadi
players.summary: Steve Nkanu Kapuadi is a professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Polish club Legia Warsaw. Born in France, he represents the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Axel Tuanzebe
players.summary: Axel Tuanzebe is a Congolese professional footballer who plays as a defender for Premier League club Burnley and the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Dylan Batubinsika
players.summary: Buduka Dylan Batubinsika is a professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Ligue 2 club Saint-Étienne. Born in France, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Joris Kayembe
players.summary: Joris Kayembe Ditu is a professional footballer who as a winger plays for Belgian First Division A club Genk. Born in Belgium and formerly a Belgium international in a pair of friendly matches, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Rocky Bushiri
players.summary: Rocky Bushiri Kisonga is a professional footballer who plays as a centre-back for Scottish Premiership side Hibernian and the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Chancel Mbemba
players.summary: Chancel Mangulu Mbemba is a Congolese professional footballer who plays for Ligue 1 club Lille and the DR Congo national team, of which he is the captain.

players.name: Gédéon Kalulu
players.summary: Gédéon Tshingoma Kalulu Kyatengwa is a professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Cypriot club Aris Limassol. Born in France, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Arthur Masuaku
players.summary: Fuka-Arthur Masuaku Kawela, known as Arthur Masuaku, is a professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Premier League club Sunderland. Born in France, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Ngal'ayel Mukau
players.summary: Ngal'ayel Mukau is a professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Ligue 1 club Lille. Born in Belgium, he represents the DR Congo at international level.

players.name: Samuel Moutoussamy
players.summary: Samuel Albert Alain Arcade Moutoussamy is a professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for Greek Super League club Atromitos. Born in France, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Gaël Kakuta
players.summary: Gaël Romeo Kakuta Mambenga is a professional footballer who plays as a winger for TFF First League club Sakaryaspor. Born in France, he represents the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Noah Sadiki
players.summary: Noah Junior Sadiki is a professional footballer who plays as a full-back, centre-back or defensive midfielder for Premier League club Sunderland. Born in Belgium, he represents the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Charles Pickel
players.summary: Charles Monginda Pickel is a professional footballer who plays as a defensive midfielder for La Liga club Espanyol. Born in Switzerland, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Edo Kayembe
players.summary: Edouard "Edo" Kayembe Kayembe is a Congolese professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for EFL Championship club Watford and the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Nathanaël Mbuku
players.summary: Nathanaël Mbuku Wa Mbuku is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for Ligue 2 club Montpellier, on loan from Bundesliga club FC Augsburg. Born in France, he represents the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Samuel Essende
players.summary: Samuel Emmanuel Essende Mbongu is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for German Bundesliga club FC Augsburg. Born in France, he represents the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Théo Bongonda
players.summary: Théo Bongonda Mbul'Ofeko Batombo is a professional footballer who plays as a winger for Russian club Spartak Moscow. Born in Belgium, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Meschak Elia
players.summary: Meschak Elia Lina is a Congolese professional footballer who plays as a forward for TurkishSüper Lig club Alanyaspor and the DR Congo national team. He received the best player award after him and his team's win in the 2016 African Nations Championship.

players.name: Cédric Bakambu
players.summary: Cédric Bakambu is a professional footballer who plays as a forward or a winger for La Liga club Real Betis and the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Fiston Mayele
players.summary: Fiston Kalala Mayele, is a Congolese professional footballer who plays as a forward for Egyptian Premier League club Pyramids FC and the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Brian Cipenga
players.summary: Brian Kibambe Cipenga is a Congolese footballer who plays as a left winger for Spanish club CD Castellón and the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Simon Banza
players.summary: Simon Bokoté Banza is a professional footballer who plays as a forward for UAE Pro League side Al Jazira. Born in France, he plays for the DR Congo national team.

players.name: Michel-Ange Balikwisha
players.summary: Michel-Ange Sumaï N'Koyi Limpata Balikwisha is a Congolese professional footballer who plays as a forward for Scottish Premiership side Celtic. Born in Belgium, he plays for the DR Congo national team.
